comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: RighteousRuler on August 17, 2022, 07:25:58 AM...I could go on and on, but I will hold back on hurting BTC maxi feelings today! Just the fact that this coin is traded only on the Yobit exchange makes me suspicious - https://coinmarketcap.com/ru/currencies/tagcoin/markets/. And considering also the fact that TAGcoin has been around for 8 years and at the same time the volume of trade is zero, we can conclude that no one is interested in this coin.

comments.author: 5W-KILO
comments.body: Tag coin equals to Yobit coin, and brother anything from Yobit exchange is a scam, most especially if the coin is listed only on Yobit exchange, I don't need to check the project out.

comments.author: newdevices
comments.body: https://coinmarketcap.com/id/currencies/tagcoin/ what do you mean by this?, I tried to see it on Coinmarektcap, and I saw TAG COIN went up by 70% more, but after I saw the listed exchanges, only Yobit who listed this TAG, it's a pity, if TAG is able to be on several exchanges such as Bitmart, Bitfinex or Gate io, maybe TAG will have more demand.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: newdevices on August 18, 2022, 06:28:39 PM...I tried to see it on Coinmarektcap, and I saw TAG COIN went up by 70% more...This has nothing to do with trading, but only shows the low liquidity of this coin. In order for the value of the coin to increase by 70%, it was enough to buy TAG coin for an amount equal to 0.00091 BTC, which is only $ 21 at today's exchange rate.
